cause.description:
People of all ages, different races, both sexes whoever wherever swopping and enlightened each other of how to get the ultimate high, in their own way. Where might they get it from and how to go about doing it. And thus learning and understanding weed, cannobis hemp whatever the street name in your hood call's it. The colour stays GREEEN. And even bring World Peace maybe-LoL. So Lets get together No Stand together and United we shall stand. Pot Smokers till the End !! Amen ... And express all the different views we might have. Wana learn how to roll, clean and all that ?? Join in and getting smoking, if youu dont ask, you'll never know.
P.S No crapping on people and Bullshit. Lets keep it fun and beahve yeah. Tell your stories and help the unsure young smokers. PEACE
1. World Peace Maybe
2. Not so much Violence
3. Alot more happier and hungry People
cause.mission: Search and Smoke the finest Bud
cause.name: Ultimate High
